Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Whatis: The name of the file to save results in a matrix format. Additionally a file with a suffix ".name" describing the content will be saved.

Parameter.Name: File Append
Parameter.Whatis: Append files when calling multiple times. False is the default.

Parameter.Name: Polyline Coordinates
Parameter.Whatis: Save data on the line segments defined by two coordinate points.

Parameter.Name: Save Axis
Parameter.Whatis: Save data on main axis. False is the default.

Parameter.Name: Save Flux
Parameter.Whatis: Save a flux, e.g. the heat flux. False is the default.

Parameter.Name: Flux Variable
Parameter.Whatis: The variable for flux computation. Temperature is the default.

Parameter.Name: Flux Coefficient
Parameter.Whatis: The coefficient for flux computation. Heat conductivity is the default.

Parameter.Name: Save Line
Parameter.Whatis: Save the line on boundary where this is set true.
